title: 10-hour water cut for Multiple areas in Colombo on Saturday (21)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A 10-hour water cut will be imposed from 10 PM on Saturday (21) for several areas in Colombo to Sunday (22) 8 AM, said the National Water Supply and Drainage Board.
Colombo 1 & 11 will receive water under a low pressure supply.
10-hour water cut for Multiple areas in Colombo on Saturday (21)
